subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Bappa Rawal founded the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty.
explanation_hi: बप्पा रावल ने गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश की स्थापना की।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following empires was a major rival of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty?
question_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश का एक प्रमुख विरोधी साम्राज्य कौनसा था?
explanation_en: Gurjara Pratihara was a major rival of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty.
explanation_hi: गुर्जर प्रतिहार गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश का एक प्रमुख विरोधी था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous Chauhan king of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के प्रसिद्ध चौहान राजा कौन थे?
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan was a famous Chauhan king of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: पृथ्वीराज चौहान राजस्थान के प्रसिद्ध चौहान राजा थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Pratihar dynasty?
question_hi: प्रतिहार वंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Raja Nagabhata I founded the Pratihar dynasty.
explanation_hi: राजा नागभट्ट प्रथम ने प्रतिहार वंश की स्थापना की।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following battles was fought between the Guhil-Sisodia and the Chauhan dynasties?
question_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया और चौहान वंशों के बीच लड़ी गई लड़ाई कौनसी थी?
explanation_en: The Battle of Haldighati was fought between the Guhil-Sisodia and the Chauhan dynasties.
explanation_hi: हाल्दीघाटी की लड़ाई गुहिल-सिसोदिया और चौहान वंशों के बीच लड़ी गई थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous ruler of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty?
question_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश के प्रसिद्ध शासक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap was a famous ruler of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty.
explanation_hi: महाराणा प्रताप गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश के प्रसिद्ध शासक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following empires was a major power in the 10th century AD in Rajasthan?
question_hi: 10वीं शताब्दी ईसवी में राजस्थान में एक प्रमुख शक्ति कौनसा साम्राज्य था?
explanation_en: Gurjara Pratihara was a major power in the 10th century AD in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: गुर्जर प्रतिहार 10वीं शताब्दी ईसवी में राजस्थान में एक प्रमुख शक्ति था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Chauhan dynasty?
question_hi: चौहान वंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Raja Vigrahraj founded the Chauhan dynasty.
explanation_hi: राजा विग्रहराज ने चौहान वंश की स्थापना की।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following battles was fought between the Guhil-Sisodia and the Pratihar dynasties?
question_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया और प्रतिहार वंशों के बीच लड़ी गई लड़ाई कौनसी थी?
explanation_en: The Battle of Kayadara was fought between the Guhil-Sisodia and the Pratihar dynasties.
explanation_hi: कायदरा की लड़ाई गुहिल-सिसोदिया और प्रतिहार वंशों के बीच लड़ी गई थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous ruler of the Pratihar dynasty?
question_hi: प्रतिहार वंश के प्रसिद्ध शासक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Raja Bhoja I was a famous ruler of the Pratihar dynasty.
explanation_hi: राजा भोज प्रथम प्रतिहार वंश के प्रसिद्ध शासक थे।
